header.title: E-Commerce
header.subtext: Buying and selling re-imagined with more informed buying decisions, reduced lead times and faster delivery!

drops.title: Drops
drops.content:
Explore a unique offer of sophisticated styles with an emphasis on material quality, fit & details  

New collections offered every month with trend-relevant styles for the North & the South to go beyond seasons and reduce your product risk

Make the most of your finances & increase your inventory-turn by buying low MOQs of 10pcs / style and receiving your delivery to your door within a week

Transparency & sustainability are at the core of our Drops â€“ producers are individually identified and sustainability qualities highlighted for each style

fastcustom.title: Fast Custom
fastcustom.subtext: Order essential styles directly from factories with short lead-times and low MOQs (Coming Soon)
fastcustom.content:
Our partner factories offer pre-developed essentials & a choice of colours in high-quality fabrics across a wide range of products

Build a low-MOQ order on-line using your size-curves and adding labelling and customization

Deal directly with factories off-line and receive your delivery within 4 weeks
